task.title: Stopping a Car
task.shortdesc: Learn the precise sequence of steps to safely and effectively bring a car to a complete stop.

context.p: Stopping a car requires a careful and methodical approach to ensure smooth deceleration and prevent engine stalling. Following the correct procedure protects both the vehicle and its occupants.

substep.cmd: Press the clutch pedal forward into neutral

substep.info: Continue until the car comes to a complete stop

substep.cmd: Pull the hand lever back to neutral position
substep.info: Do not remove foot from the clutch pedal before doing this to prevent engine stalling

substep.cmd: Open the throttle slightly to accelerate the motor

substep.info: This stops the engine with cylinders full of explosive gas, which aids future starting

result.p: Mastering this stopping procedure ensures smooth vehicle deceleration and protects the car's mechanical systems.

postreq.p: Practice until the process of disengaging the clutch and applying the brake becomes an automatic response, especially in emergency situations.
